manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Paperback Special Edition Paperback Audio Other ways to enjoy Irresistibly Broken Hot guy cover with special internal formatting Alternative cover with special interior formatting Narration by Stella Hunter and Sebastian York. YUM!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holy Hot Zaxton and Aurelia are PERFECT!!
reviews.reviewText: Spice Level: 🌶️🌶️🌶️🌶️🌶️Tropes:- Age Gap- Billionaire- Boss/ Employee- Enemies to Lovers with all the banter- Grumpy X Sunshine- Tragic PastIf you are looking for all the fantasy/ role playing, banter you can get I highly recommend this amazing book! This is a dual narrative told by Zaxton and Aurelia.Zaxton a broken CEO Fashion Mogul Boss who is the definition of a broody grump. Unable to let go of his past eight years later. He is damaged upon repair. So he thought!Aurelia an inspiring fashion designer ex model. Just trying to rebuild what was stolen from her while maintaining a positiveattitude.Both characters were everything I could have hoped for and more. Their chemistry, past and connection while throwing in their banter will leave you wanting more. The mouth on them both was so perfect and made it so much more entertaining. Both MCs damaged in their own way wanting to write each others wrongs.There were some awe moments, a lot of giggles, A LOT of SPICE.The way Zax was able to find love again after losing the love of his life eight years ago was so beautiful to read. Uhhhh and when he confessed his darkest secret to Aurelia made me heart jump into my throat.After basically being abandoned at the age of 16 by her “mother” and black listed by someone she trusted, seeing her gain a family was incredible.The end of the book pulled at my heart strings! They both got everything they ever wanted and was an amazing ending of the book.Now for the best and most important part!!! The SPICE!! My god! Was it juicy! I mean the hotel (Zax hotel, suite) scene and every spicy scene after that live forever in the back (maybe the front) of my mind!I 1000000000/10 recommend this amazing read!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Age-gap, ex step sister, 2nd chance at love
reviews.reviewText: Irresistibly Broken is my introduction to J. Saman's writing. I kept seeing this book on social media, and the cover drew me in.Zaxton Monroe, Bass; Greyson Monroe, frontman, played in a band called Central Square, along with Callen Barrows, drums; Asher Reyes, guitar, and Lenox Moore, piano and keyboards; their manager was Suzie Moore, Lenox's twin sister, and Zaxton's girlfriend until she died in the shower. The Boston band members went in different directions. Callen Barrows became a doctor; Asher Reyes is a quarterback for the NFL. Greyson stayed in the music business as a solo artist, and Zaxton took over his father Elias's business. Lenox retreated to Maine.Aurilia Whitlock was the stepsister to the Monroe brothers when her mother married their father; the marriage didn't last very long. Aurilia was approached by a talent manager regarding modeling when she was only sixteen, and her mother thought this was an excellent opportunity to leave her daughter on her own, so Aurilia became model Lia Sage. Aurilia saved money and enrolled in the Fashion Institute of Technology, FIT, where she studied to become a fashion designer. However, she was blackballed by another designer who stole her design. Now, she was looking for any position in the fashion industry.I was cheering for Aurilia to succeed and get the guy. And after reading the second epilogue, I need to read Greyson's story. Way to go and win fans over by giving them a peek at the next book in the series.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Perfect Match🔥💗
reviews.reviewText: I just finished reading this story and I absolutely love every bit of it! It was so good that I did not want to put it down. Aurelia is a amazing woman! She is determined, gorgeous, talented and loving. I instantly fell in love with her. She is trying to make a mark in the world. Zax is my new book boyfriend. He is hard, smart, rich and hot. He is a man with few but but mean them. These two broken souls found love in unexpected way but I love it for them. The writing was truly amazing and I love the flows of things. This is my first time reading from the two authors so I can't really tell their work from apart which is good in my book. I love it. Amazing work J. Saman and Julie Saman!💞💞

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So well written. An unusual enemies to lovers story involving Jason Monroe, former band bass player turned fashion mogul, and his ex-stepsister and fashion model, Aurelia. The tale includes a bit of industrial espionage as evil ousted father attempts to reclaim his former CEO position using the multi-talented Aurelia as a pawn in his game, never realizing what a strong and resourceful survivor she is. Mix in humor involving his former band mate friends and one has an entertaining story to enjoy. Not overdone on angst and stupid miscommunication issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A fun Read
reviews.reviewText: This is a fun read. She used to be his step-sister and he had a highschool band at that time and was in love with the girl in the band. The parent’s divorce and they lose touch. He has left the band and is head of a high fashion design company (cause his dad got kicked out for sexual misconduct). She also went into high fashion but got blackballed because the owner of the house she designed for stole her design and objected to her objecting. With that background, the story starts with her day 1 at his company being mugged as he arrives. It is a very fun read without a whole lot of credibility for his former band or the fashion industry. It is worth it to set those credibilities aside and enjoy the story.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This book is great. Well written, fantastic characters, steamy love scenes, humor. It has a bit of everything and you won’t regret reading it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Enjoyed the banter between characters. The secondary characters are what’s pushing me to continue to read the series. In addition to the author’s writing style.There were a few eye-rolling, annoying moments that I skimmed but overall a good story with a nice ending.The 2nd epilogue was a bit long-winded and should’ve mostly be in the next book which it probably is as it gives context.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I laughed and cried
reviews.reviewText: Laugh out loud with snorts and sore ribs. You fall in love with all the characters that count. The sass, the snark, then there’s the steamy hotness and the tears as well. A great read! Couldn’t put it down. Cannot wait to read the next book in the series!

reviews.reviewTitle: First time reading this author's amazing book!!
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely loved your writing style, as well as the heart and soul and spice and wrenching angst you brought to their story! Both were so broken and cautious but blindsided by the other with feelings they didn't expect or want! Thank you J. Saman. I loved the first book in this series! On to the next one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm not sure why it took me so long to get round to reading this as I have been reading excerpts from this series in author emails since it started and always thought the books sounded like I would enjoy them. Whatever the reason, I finally read Irresistably Yours and now I'm going to have to binge read the whole series so I can find out all the rest of Central Square's stories!I loved the chemistry Zax and Aurelia had right from the outset and although it was a slow burn before they finally succumbed to their need for one another, there was still plenty of heat. And once they caved? Phew (fans herself!) I enjoyed the characters around them too. Zax and Aurelia's friends were the kind everyone needs - there to tease and have fun with, but always there with support when required. Without wishing to spoil anything, I also enjoyed the element of suspense about what Zax's father was up to and the conclusion of this element of the story was more than satisfying.I'm looking forward to reading Greyson's story next and seeing more of the other band members.

This book receives 4.5 stars! 🌟👗I adore this book, and J did an excellent job writing it. The characters are a wonderful match for one another and exude chemistry. I admire how they overcome difficulties and allowed themselves to compromise. The banter, and the push and pull will make you want for more.This book will definitely burn you! I'm so excited for the next book in the series!

Understanding what Zaxton went through and closing his heart, to Aurelia raising herself from 16 in a toxoc environment but coming out as a beautiful, intelligent and caring person. J. Saman sure knows how to make you cheer and mourn for her characters and it is well worth the read.

reviews.reviewTitle: Wow. What a start to a new series.
reviews.reviewText: Zax and Aurelia are pure fire together. They combust on the page. This might honestly be the spiciest book J has given us yet. From the moment I started reading I didn't want to put it down. these two characters have everything it takes to create a fiery passion like no other. I actually have regrets about not jumping into this book sooner then I did.
